About Me

A cyber security enthusiast with 2 Years of working experience in Vulnerability Assessment, Vulnerability Management, Penetration Testing. I also have a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science & Engineering Shivaji University and a Diploma Degree in Computer Science & Engineering Shivaji University. I sometimes play CTF’s on hackthebox, lab.pentestit.ru, root-me.org, overthewire, tryhackme and others. I also document my learnings which can be found on my blog. I’m self-confident, self-Learner, fluent speaker, funny and naturally passionate in Information Security.

Let's Talk about OSCP and a career in Cyber Security

People who pentest towards offensive side definitely want to be a OSCP certified, but due to its toughness and challenging nature it gets confusing while preparing. In this talk, I spoke about who to prepare OSCP, key takeaways, important points & suggestions for praparation of OSCP exam.
